I want to drink water...\""},{"lineNumber":179937,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみが水筒を振る。既に中身は空である。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami shakes her water bottle. It's already empty."},{"lineNumber":179938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうですねぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, that's right..."},{"lineNumber":179939,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも限りがありますから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But it's limited, so...\""},{"lineNumber":179940,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目でちよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That won't do.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しパクってけばしばらく生活には困らんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we pinch a little, we won't have any trouble living for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス兄様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Brother Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のご自分の立場をお忘れのような……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like you've forgotten your current position...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貧乏臭いこと言うなシィル。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't say such cheap things, Seel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな呆れてるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone must be amazed though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひんっ、な、何も言ってないですぅ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hn, I-I didn't say anything~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、さすがに金で出来ているは嘘でちね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, certainly it's a lie that he's made of gold."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、知ってるのか案内人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you know about it, guide?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わたちはギルドの所属歴が浅いでちから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've only been with the guild for a short time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラは数回行っただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I've only been to Shangri-La a few times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり知らないでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I don't know much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでもいい、知ってる限りのことを聞かせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's fine. Tell us everything you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでちねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先輩から聞いた話だと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to what I heard from a senior,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 35年前、突如として現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 35 years ago, an oasis city suddenly appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オアシス都市と聞いたでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's called an oasis city."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どの国にも属さない独立都市として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As an independent city not belonging to any country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在自体知られてないとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: its very existence is unknown to many..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴金属に宝石と、かなり羽振りが良いので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With its precious metals and jewels, it's quite wealthy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ギルド内でも大口の客として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even within the guild, it's regarded as a major client,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事にされてたそうでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and treated with great importance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……そんな都市があるとはな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... I didn't know such a city existed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら知っていたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you guys know about it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅん、話にも聞いたことないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I have never even heard of it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「余も初耳だ。くくく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's new to me too. Hehehe...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのようにしてそんな都市が出来たのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm very interested in how such a city came to be,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味は尽きんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my curiosity never ends."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「都市自体は豪華で広く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The city itself was luxurious and vast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に整備されて綺麗でちたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: always maintained and beautiful, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？　なんか気になることがあるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Is there something bothering you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人がいないんでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There were no people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「デスココ王という男が支配者であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The ruler was a man named King Deskoko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あとは50人ほどの美しい踊り子だけの都市でち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and besides him, the city only had about 50 beautiful dancers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼のハーレムだそうでちたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was said to be his harem,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガラーンとしてなんとも不気味な都市でち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the emptiness made the city eerily unsettling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、デスココ王が金持ちなのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, King Deskoko was definitely rich,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いないでち、お金さえ貰えれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no doubt about that. As long as he got money,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 関係ないことでちたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he didn't care about anything else..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむ、50名ほどの踊り子で作ったハーレム……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, a harem made up of about 50 dancers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「許せん！　デスココ王！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unforgivable! King Deskoko!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーレムを作るのは俺様だけの特権だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only I have the privilege to make a harem!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くくく、丁度いい、その男を殺して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehe, perfect. I'll kill that man

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーレムをそっくり俺のものに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and take the entire harem for myself..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それなら手遅れでちたね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case, it's too late,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分デスココ王は生きてないでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King Deskoko is probably no longer alive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？　死んだのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What? He's dead?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二年ほど前から応対するのが踊り子だけになり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About two years ago, only the dancers began responding,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デスココ王とは誰も会えなくなったでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and no one could meet King Deskoko anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次第に都市も寂れ、汚れが目立ち……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gradually, the city fell into disrepair, and dirt became noticeable..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ギルドではもしかしたらデスココ王は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Within the guild, rumors spread that perhaps King Deskoko

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう死んだのではと噂でちたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was already dead..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「多分、あの頃からシャングリラは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perhaps, from that time, Shangri-La had been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されていたのでち……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: occupied by the demon army..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行はシャングリラ目指し進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group proceeds toward Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……水が飲みたい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... I want to drink water..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが水筒を振る。既に中身は空である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami shakes her water bottle. It's already empty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうですねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes, that's right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも限りがありますから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it's limited, so..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目でちよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That won't do."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しパクってけばしばらく生活には困らんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we pinch a little, we won't have any trouble living for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス兄様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Brother Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のご自分の立場をお忘れのような……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like you've forgotten your current position...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貧乏臭いこと言うなシィル。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't say such cheap things, Seel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな呆れてるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone must be amazed though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひんっ、な、何も言ってないですぅ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hn, I-I didn't say anything~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、さすがに金で出来ているは嘘でちね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, certainly it's a lie that he's made of gold."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、知ってるのか案内人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you know about it, guide?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わたちはギルドの所属歴が浅いでちから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've only been with the guild for a short time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラは数回行っただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I've only been to Shangri-La a few times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり知らないでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I don't know much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでもいい、知ってる限りのことを聞かせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's fine. Tell us everything you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでちねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先輩から聞いた話だと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to what I heard from a senior,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 35年前、突如として現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 35 years ago, an oasis city suddenly appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オアシス都市と聞いたでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's called an oasis city."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どの国にも属さない独立都市として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As an independent city not belonging to any country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在自体知られてないとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: its very existence is unknown to many..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴金属に宝石と、かなり羽振りが良いので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With its precious metals and jewels, it's quite wealthy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ギルド内でも大口の客として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even within the guild, it's regarded as a major client,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事にされてたそうでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and treated with great importance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……そんな都市があるとはな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... I didn't know such a city existed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ら知っていたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you guys know about it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅん、話にも聞いたことないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I have never even heard of it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「余も初耳だ。くくく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's new to me too. Hehehe...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのようにしてそんな都市が出来たのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm very interested in how such a city came to be,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味は尽きんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my curiosity never ends."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「都市自体は豪華で広く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The city itself was luxurious and vast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に整備されて綺麗でちたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: always maintained and beautiful, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？　なんか気になることがあるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Is there something bothering you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人がいないんでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There were no people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「デスココ王という男が支配者であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The ruler was a man named King Deskoko,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あとは50人ほどの美しい踊り子だけの都市でち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and besides him, the city only had about 50 beautiful dancers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼のハーレムだそうでちたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was said to be his harem,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガラーンとしてなんとも不気味な都市でち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the emptiness made the city eerily unsettling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、デスココ王が金持ちなのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, King Deskoko was definitely rich,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いないでち、お金さえ貰えれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no doubt about that. As long as he got money,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 関係ないことでちたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he didn't care about anything else..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむ、50名ほどの踊り子で作ったハーレム……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, a harem made up of about 50 dancers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「許せん！　デスココ王！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unforgivable! King Deskoko!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーレムを作るのは俺様だけの特権だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only I have the privilege to make a harem!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くくく、丁度いい、その男を殺して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehe, perfect. I'll kill that man

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーレムをそっくり俺のものに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and take the entire harem for myself..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それなら手遅れでちたね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case, it's too late,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分デスココ王は生きてないでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King Deskoko is probably no longer alive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？　死んだのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What? He's dead?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二年ほど前から応対するのが踊り子だけになり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About two years ago, only the dancers began responding,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デスココ王とは誰も会えなくなったでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and no one could meet King Deskoko anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次第に都市も寂れ、汚れが目立ち……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gradually, the city fell into disrepair, and dirt became noticeable..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ギルドではもしかしたらデスココ王は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Within the guild, rumors spread that perhaps King Deskoko

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう死んだのではと噂でちたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was already dead..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「多分、あの頃からシャングリラは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perhaps, from that time, Shangri-La had been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されていたのでち……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: occupied by the demon army..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行はシャングリラ目指し進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group proceeds toward Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……水が飲みたい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... I want to drink water..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが水筒を振る。既に中身は空である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami shakes her water bottle. It's already empty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうですねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes, that's right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも限りがありますから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it's limited, so..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目でちよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That won't do."
